extractions.description: The paper investigates changes in handover behavior when transferring hazardous objects with the help of a high-resolution touch sensor. Through experiments where participants handover a safe and hazardous object while using a modified sensor, the study identifies key tactile factors influencing the negotiation phase and overall handover duration. The goal is to inform safer human-robot interactions by understanding human-human handover dynamics.

title.value: A Study of Human-Robot Handover through Human-Human Object Transfer
title.justification: This is the exact title from the research paper.
title.quote: A Study of Human-Robot Handover through Human-Human Object Transfer

type.justification: The paper conducts experiments to study human-human object transfer, analyzes the data collected, and reports findings based on observations and sensor measurements.
type.quote: In this preliminary study, we investigate changes... Our data shows a clear distinction...

research_field.justification: The study aims at improving human-robot interactions by understanding human-human handover behavior.
research_field.quote: ...ensuring safe and efficient human-robot interactions will be crucial.

sub_research_field.justification: The primary focus is on handover dynamics between humans to inform similar interactions between humans and robots.
sub_research_field.quote: ...to develop robotic behaviours that leverage this knowledge for safe human-robot object handover.

name.justification: The dataset involves recordings of human-human handovers using a haptic sensor to collect tactile and visual data.
name.quote: We design a wrist-mounted tactile enabled finger that allows researchers to collect large datasets of human-human handover interactions while recording visual and tactile sensory feedback.

name.justification: The paper mentions the use of optical flow vectors to analyze tactile data from the haptic sensor.
name.quote: we compute dense optical flow vectors of the STS image readings...
